A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great Movie with some really underwhelming results from characters that deserved to do more. That being said\, I still loved it. A shit ton of action. Rian Johnson basically turned Star Wars on its head. He performed order 66 on pretty much everything about the lore. His vision is pretty brutal\, and not as romantic as the original movies. One things for sure\, opinions on this movie is going to split the fanbase.
